author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Noesis Ind: Outcome of board meeting
description: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith a copy of Unaudited Financial Results of the Company as per Ind-AS alongwith Limited Review Report for the Quarter ended on 30th June, 2017.
articleBody: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith a copy of Unaudited Financial Results of the Company as per Ind-AS alongwith Limited Review Report for the Quarter ended on 30th June, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Noesis Industries' board meeting on November 10, 2016
description: Noesis Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 10, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Un-audited Financial Results for the Quarter and 6 months ended September 30, 2016.
articleBody: Noesis Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 10, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Un-audited Financial Results for the Quarter and 6 months ended September 30, 2016.Further, as per the &quot;Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading&quot; of the Company, the trading window will remain closed for all directors /officers /designated employees of the Company from November 02, 2016 to November 12, 2016 (both days inclusive) on account of consideration of Un-audited Financial Results for the Quarter and 6 months ended September 30, 2016.Source : BSE Read all announcements in MVL Industries

headline: MVL Industries standalone Dec '13 sales at Rs 0.05 crore

headline: MVL Industries fixes book closure for AGM
description: The Register of Members &amp; Share Transfer Books of MVL Industries will remain closed from December 21, 2013 to December 27, 2013 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of 26th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on December 27, 2013.
articleBody: MVL Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the Register of Members &amp; Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from December 21, 2013 to December 27, 2013 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of 26th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on December 27, 2013.Source : BSE Read all announcements in MVL Industries

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: MVL Industries: Board meeting on October 17, 2013
description: MVL Industries has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on October 17, 2013.
articleBody: MVL Industries Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on October 17, 2013, inter alia, to consider to apply to the Registrar of Companies, NCT of Delhi &amp; Haryana for changing the name of the Company from &quot;MVL Industries Limited&quot; to &quot;Swarn Industries Limited&quot; or such other similar name as may be approved / made available by Registrar of Companies, NCT of Delhi &amp; Haryana.Source : BSE Read all announcements in MVL Industries
